entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
